about_the_game:
Grow Harvest Repeat is a relaxing 2D farming game where you plant, grow, and harvest crops. Take care of your garden, expand your farm, and unlock new features as you progress.

Future updates, shaped by player's feedback, will include crafting, upgrades, new crops, and additional gardens to explore.

Key Features:

  • Plant, grow, and harvest a variety of crops

  • Expand your garden and unlock new areas

  • Relaxing, stress-free gameplay with no time limits

  • Future updates will add crafting, upgrades, and more
